title: Countdown Watch Face
summary: Simple and minimalist countdown on your watch face. Ready for your new event?
description: Countdown Watch Face is a simple and cool looking countdown for your wrist. It is designed for Android Wear devices and works with square and round smartwatches.Features:- countdown- date- weather option- colours Set your countdown  and colours directly on the watch face preferences.Tested with LG G Watch R, LG Watch and MOTO 360.
descriptionHTML:
Countdown Watch Face is a simple and cool looking countdown for your wrist. It is designed for Android Wear devices and works with square and round smartwatches.
Features:
- countdown
- date
- weather option
- colours

Set your countdown and colours directly on the watch face preferences.

Tested with LG G Watch R, LG Watch and MOTO 360.
comments: Best countdown watch face Does exactly what it says, with the added bonus of the weather. Could make it better by only showing icons for weather and adding numbers to dim mode. But very nice and simple.
recentChanges: Change colors and show/hide weather info
